about_the_game:
You wake up suddenly in a dark, unfamiliar place. You realize that you are in an open cell inside a dungeon, without your things, dressed only in rags, and no matter how hard you try, you don’t remember how you got to this dreary place. As you step out of the cell, you find a campfire that never goes out, a spectre that seems harmless and 3 mysterious altars, as well as a door that leads to deeper parts of the dungeon, from where you perceive the shadows of hostile beings. You decide to set up camp in this room, as an unknown power blocks magic and seems to prevent enemies from approaching.



DUNGEON OF THE FORGOTTEN KING is a Turn Based Single Player RPG with graphics that mix Pixel Art with 3D. The game is mainly focused on combat, where you must defeat enemies to obtain Gold and Loot. Gold is your most valuable resource, as it is used as an offering at the Magic Altars for your character to level up, heal wounds or change classes; you can also give gold to the Merchant Spectre to receive random equipment.

As you level up, the enemies become more varied and powerful, and the rewards improve. The Dungeon Master may appear when your level is high enough to attract his attention.

Have several fights in a row to increase the probability of getting Loot and obtaining more Gold, but don't be too bold, as the enemies become more powerful the more battles you have before returning to the camp.

Death is permanent, so you must carefully plan when and how to spend your Gold to progress in the game and exit the Dungeon.

Manage your resources well, upgrade your character and defeat the Dungeon Master to find the way out!

In the full game, you should expect more clases, more enemies, upgrades to get and improve your runs. Maybe even, targeting a class right from the start.



We're calling this demo an "Alpha" because it's our initial study on the game, and as we developed it, we noticed several changes we wanted to make, both things to remove and things to add. So, at some point in the future, we will update this demo to a version that is closer to the final vision of the project.
